Question.DisplayName: Re-write a negative thought with a positive spin!

QuestionContent.Title: The following text is a negative thought that a person typed about themself:
"%%THOUGHT.TAG%%"

Rewrite this thought in a way that is more positive. For instance, try to think up a way of saying it that might go on a motivational poster. Try to be as inspirational as possible so that you can encourage the person to feel better about themself!
QuestionContent.Text: Here is an example negative thought:

List.ListItem: "I am so terrible at speaking in public...everyone is going to think I'm an idiot."
"I present great ideas. That's what really matters."
"I am going to share my brilliance with the world, and who cares what they think!"

QuestionContent.Text: Note: You cannot simply negate what was written, or make the thought more negative. Unacceptable responses include not changing the text at all, submitting nothing, or something like:

List.ListItem: "I am not terrible at speaking in public, and everyone is not going to think I'm an idiot."
"I suck so bad at speaking in public. What a complete loser!"
